Gently

A beginner-friendly programming language

Gently is designed to be easy to read and write, like English.

Gently Language Guide

Variables

set name to "Alice"
set age to 25
set playing to yes

Math

set sum to a plus b
set diff to a minus b
set product to a times b
set quotient to a divided by b
set remainder to a mod b

note: Also works with symbols
set result to 5 + 3 * 2
set grouped to (a plus b) times c

Text

set greeting to "Hello " joined with name
print greeting
set len to length of greeting

Comparisons

a is equal to b
a is greater than b
a is less than b
a is greater than or equal to b
a is less than or equal to b

Logic

a and b
a or b
not a

Conditionals

if score is greater than 90 then
    print "A"
else if score is greater than 80 then
    print "B"
else
    print "C"
end if

Loops

repeat 5 times
    print "Hello"
end repeat

repeat while n is greater than 0
    print n
    set n to n minus 1
end repeat

for each item in myList do
    print item
end for

Lists

set fruits to list of "apple", "banana", "cherry"
set first to item 1 of fruits
set count to length of fruits
set item 2 of fruits to "blueberry"

Functions

function greet taking name
    print "Hello, " joined with name
end function

greet with "World"

function add taking a b
    return a plus b
end function

set result to add with 5 and 3

Random Numbers

set dice to random number from 1 to 6

User Input

ask "What is your name?" and store in name
ask "Enter a number:" and store in num
note: Numbers are automatically detected

Drawing

clear canvas
set color to "red"
draw circle at 100, 100 with radius 50
draw rectangle at 50, 50 with width 100 and height 80
draw line from 0, 0 to 200, 200

Comments

note: This is a comment

Booleans

set playing to yes
set gameOver to no
